name: places/ChIJTUNULghZwokRNudZfq3v4Ec
formattedAddress: 132 Lexington Ave, New York, NY 10016, USA
adrFormatAddress: 132 Lexington Ave, New York, NY 10016-8124, USA

editorialSummary.text: Store featuring traditional Indian clothing for men, women & kids, plus statues & home decor.

originalText.text: As all tuxedo fittings (for me, anyways), I was fully expecting to spend a an hour or two here. The incredible and friendly staff got me in and out in under 30 minutes! My friend and I walked in with no idea what to wear for an upcoming wedding, and the staff guided us, while keeping budget in mind. Highly recommend and looking forward to coming back!

text.text: As all tuxedo fittings (for me, anyways), I was fully expecting to spend a an hour or two here. The incredible and friendly staff got me in and out in under 30 minutes! My friend and I walked in with no idea what to wear for an upcoming wedding, and the staff guided us, while keeping budget in mind. Highly recommend and looking forward to coming back!

originalText.text: We have a wedding in India in one month and still had nothing to wear. We went to Vintage India and they were so helpful and picked out all the perfect outfits for my husband and I that we needed for the 3 days of festivities. Highly recommend!

text.text: We have a wedding in India in one month and still had nothing to wear. We went to Vintage India and they were so helpful and picked out all the perfect outfits for my husband and I that we needed for the 3 days of festivities. Highly recommend!

originalText.text:
I am brand new to picking out Indian Wear, and needed several outfits for my sister’s engagement ceremony, Puja, and Diwali festival in Mumbai. Vintage India was my very first stop in NYC. Not sure how I got so lucky on the first try, but Ish (the owner) and her staff are the absolute best! They asked all the right questions, and helped me find the perfect outfit for each event. They will make you feel at home, give you individual attention, and make sure you look great! And they will recommend what looks best on YOU (not the item with the highest price tag).

My fiancé also needed a few outfits, and felt comfortable with every staff member. They are all kind and helpful! We were able to find 4 complete outfits (including accessories) in under 2 hours. And we love everything! We even went back to purchase an additional Lehenga, and it was so quick and easy! I’ve witnessed several men and women pick out event clothing and all seemed comfortable, relaxed, and happy with their purchases. Ish will also recommend a great, experienced tailor for any needed alterations.

Vintage India’s starting prices are the best in Manhattan, AND they offered us an even better deal because we purchased multiple outfits. This was so helpful and appreciated as we still have to purchase our plane tickets and hotel. Don’t waste your time anywhere else! Just go to Vintage India! You won’t regret it!!

originalText.text:
The staff at VintageIndiaNYC are very  knowledgeable, attentive, and passionate about Indian fashion. They provided me with personalized assistance, guided me through their vast collection and let me tell you the styles and quality was just amazing, totally loved it !
They helped me to find the perfect outfits for my cousin’s wedding occasions. Their staff was always ready with expert advices and suggestions, making my shopping experience enjoyable and hassle-free.
Definitely recommending this store to everyone!

originalText.text:
I recently visited vintageindianyc store along with my frnds while searching for the perfect bridesmaid dresses. The moment I stepped into the store, I was blown away by the exceptional service, stunning collection and overall experience. I'm thrilled to give vintageindianyc a well deserved 5 star review.
Ish and her staff were incredibly  helpful and knowledgeable. They took time to understand our preferences and requirements and walked us through their extensive range of bridesmaid collection. Their attention to details helped us to find the perfect ensemble that complimented our individual styles and body types. The personalized service we received made us feel like valuable customers!
